com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views

Class MapViewGestureDetectorListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimpleOnGestureListener
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views.MapViewGestureDetectorListener

  • public class MapViewGestureDetectorListener
extends SimpleOnGestureListener
    A custom gesture detector that processes gesture events and dispatches them to the map's overlay system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      MapViewGestureDetectorListener(MapView mv)
      Bind a new gesture detector to a map
